verses.name: Acts 15:10
verses.text: Now therefore why tempt ye God, to put a yoke upon the neck of the disciples, which neither our fathers nor we were able to bear?

verses.name: Acts 15:11
verses.text: But we believe that through the grace of the Lord Jesus Christ we shall be saved, even as they.

verses.name: Acts 15:12
verses.text: Then all the multitude kept silence, and gave audience to Barnabas and Paul, declaring what miracles and wonders God had wrought among the Gentiles by them.

verses.name: Acts 15:13
verses.text: And after they had held their peace, James answered, saying, Men and brethren, hearken unto me:
